biotools.summary: ImaGEO is a web tool for gene expression Meta-Analysis that implements a complete and comprehensive meta-analysis workflow starting from Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) dataset identifiers. The application integrates GEO datasets, applies different meta-analysis techniques and provides functional analysis results in an easy-to-use environment. ImaGEO is a powerful and useful resource that allows researchers to integrate and perform meta-analysis of GEO datasets to lead robust findings for biomarker discovery studies.
